headline.main: Use of U.S. Ships Asked; BRITISH TO TIGHTEN BLOCKADE OF EIRE

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Jan. 1 (UP) -- The British and United States Governments are considering a plan whereby American merchant ships would take over British shipping routes over an extensive Pacific area, releasing British ships for urgent war
abstract: Ship route exch planned to release Brit ships from Pacific for Atlantic and Mediterranean
snippet: LONDON, Jan. 1 (UP) -- The British and United States Governments are considering a plan whereby American merchant ships would take over British shipping routes over an extensive Pacific area, releasing British ships for urgent war...
